<h3 id="X13900">X(13900)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd TRI-SQUARES-CENTRAL AND LUCAS(-1) HOMOTHETIC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (12*R^2+SB+SC)*S^2+(8*(SB+SC)*R^2+SA^2-2*SW^2)*S-(SB+SC)*SW^2  :  :  <p>X(13900) lies on these lines: {6,13957}, {371,8213}, {485,9839}, {494,3068}, {590,8223}, {6461,13899}, {6463,8972}, {8189,13888}, {8195,13889}, {8211,13902}, {8215,13893}, {8217,8974}, {8219,8975}, {8221,8976}, {8980,12187}, {8981,10673}, {8983,12441}, {8988,12742}, {8991,12987}, {8992,12993}, {8993,12995}, {8994,12378}, {8995,12999}, {8997,13185}, {8998,13216}, {9540,11829}, {10876,13892}, {10946,13895}, {10952,13896}, {11378,13883}, {11395,13884}, {11504,13887}, {11841,13885}, {11847,13886}, {11908,13894}, {11931,13897}, {11933,13898}, {11948,13901}, {11950,13903}, {11952,13904}, {11954,13905}, {11956,13906}, {11958,13907}, {12153,13846}, {12353,13908}, {12427,13909}, {12591,13910}, {12637,13911}, {12766,13913}, {12862,13914}, {12895,13915}, {12989,13916}, {12991,13917}, {12997,13918}, {13001,13919}, {13003,13921}, {13005,13879}, {13276,13922}, {13299,13923}, {13698,13920}, {13818,13848}</p>
